movie.title: An Act of Conscience
movie.plot: When a young couple buys the contested home at auction from the U.S. government for $5,400, they become involved in a political and moral battle much larger than what they originally bargained for.

events.title: Randy Kehler's house is sold at auction to Danny Franklin and Terry Charnesky
Randy Kehler's supporters move in and occupy the contested house
an injunction is issued against the Kehler-Corner protests
an out of court settlement is reached
